title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6218.7 - Evidence and proof
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6218.7 - Evidence and proof

State Regulations

The strict rules of evidence do not apply to administrative
proceedings under this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6218.7

Adopted

New

York State Register November 10, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 45, eff. 11/10/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
